SELECT t_da_supplier.city_id as cityId, t_da_province.province_id, t_da_supplier.supplier_id as supplierId, t_da_supplier.supplier_name as supplierName, t_da_city.city_name as cityName, t_da_city.city_abbreviation as cityAbbreviation, t_da_province.province_name as provinceName, t_da_province.province_abbreviation as provinceAbbreviation, case when supplierproduct.product_count is null then 0 else supplierproduct.product_count end as productCount FROM t_da_supplier LEFT JOIN t_da_city ON t_da_supplier.city_id = t_da_city.city_id LEFT JOIN t_da_province ON t_da_province.province_id = t_da_city.province_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(productbrand_id) as product_count, supplier_id FROM t_da_supplierproduct GROUP BY supplier_id ) as supplierproduct on supplierproduct.supplier_id = t_da_supplier.supplier_id WHERE t_da_supplier.supplier_id > 0
t_da_supplier.supplier_name like '%$param.supplierName$%'
$orderByStatement$
LIMIT $first$, $pageSize$;
